mapper.select: /* planner.selectList */ SELECT SEQ , PARENT_SEQ , TYPE , NAME , CONTENTS , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USE_YN , FILE_SEQ FROM TB_PLANNER A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PARENT_SEQ = -1

/* planner.selectOne */ SELECT SEQ , PARENT_SEQ , TYPE , NAME , CONTENTS , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USE_YN , FILE_SEQ , SORT_ORDER FROM ( SELECT SEQ , PARENT_SEQ , TYPE , NAME , CONTENTS , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USE_YN , FILE_SEQ , '1' SORT_ORDER FROM TB_PLANNER A WHERE SEQ = #{seq} UNION ALL SELECT SEQ , PARENT_SEQ , TYPE , NAME , CONTENTS , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , USE_YN , FILE_SEQ , '0' SORT_ORDER FROM TB_PLANNER A WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{seq} ) A ORDER BY SORT_ORDER DESC, SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: /* planner.insert */ INSERT INTO TB_PLANNER( PARENT_SEQ , TYPE , NAME , CONTENTS , UPDATE_DATE )VALUES( #{parentSeq} , #{type} , #{name} , #{contents} , DATETIME('now', 'localtime') )
